title: Trans and Autistic: Interview with Noah Adams
itunes:title: Trans and Autistic: Interview with Noah Adams
description:
We talk with PHD student Noah Adams about his research into the intersection of autism and being trans.


https://www.canadahelps.org/en/charities/metropolitan-community-church-of-toronto/campaign/trans-and-proud/ 
https://twitter.com/noahadams 
https://www.amazon.com/Trans-Autistic-Stories-Life-Intersection-ebook/dp/B08289P67Z
